WebAssembly Minesweeper

  • To win: you must correctly flag all squares that contain a mine
  • You lose if:
    • you reveal a square with a mine
    • you place the last flag and one at least one of the squares is flagged incorrectly
  • Left Click a square to reveal it
  • Shift+Left Click to place a flag (🚩) on a square
  • Ctrl+Left Click to place a question mark (?) on a square
  • Left click the smiley face button to start (or restart) a game
  • Click the settings button to adjust the number of rows and columns in the grid
